findings.title: Unprotected function calls in ERC20 implementation
findings.description: The ERC20 implementation contains unprotected function calls which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in DividendPayingToken implementation
findings.description: The DividendPayingToken implementation contains unprotected function calls, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Lack of access control in withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to withdraw dividends.

findings.title: Lack of access control in transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform transfers.

findings.title: Lack of access control in approve function
findings.description: The approve function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate approvals.

findings.title: Lack of access control in transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform actions.

findings.title: Lack of access control in increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify allowances.

findings.title: Lack of access control in decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected internal functions in ERC20 implementation
findings.description: Internal functions _approve are accessible from outside the contract and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected internal functions in DividendPayingToken implementation
findings.description: The DividendPayingToken implementation contains unprotected internal functions which can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy vulnerabilities in _transfer, _mint, and _burn functions
findings.description: Reentrancy vulnerability exists in _transfer, _mint, and _burn functions.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized access to excludeFromDividends function
findings.description: The excludeFromDividends function can be accessed without proper authorization, potentially leading to unauthorized modifications.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized access to updateClaimWait function
findings.description: The updateClaimWait function may allow unauthorized access, potentially leading to unintended changes.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized access to fixBalance function
findings.description: The fixBalance function may allow unauthorized access, potentially leading to unintended balance modifications.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized access to setBalance function
findings.description: The setBalance function has a potential unauthorized access vulnerability.
